extDescription.message: Tuck your tabs into your virtual pouch for easy organization and effortless retrieval.

popProcessing.description: [popup] message while a new tab is being added

popDuplicate.message: This tab is already in your pouch. what do you want to do?
popDuplicate.description: [popup] message when user tries to add a tab that is already added

popError.description: [popup] message when the add tab process fails

popSuccess.description: [popup] message when a new tab gets added successfuly

tabBookmarkEdit.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to trigger editing a bookmark

tabBookmarkEditIcon.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to trigger editing a bookmark icon

tabBookmarkEditTitle.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to trigger editing a bookmark title

tabBookmarkEditDescription.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to trigger editing a bookmark description

tabBookmarkEditDelete.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to delete a bookmark

tabBookmarkEditDeleteConfirm.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to confirm the deletetion of a bookmark

tabBookmarkEditMove.description: [newtab] tooltip on a button to move a bookmark
